column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place has atmosphere in spades!  Hip vibe
column3: and stays open late.  The cocktail menu was diverse
column4: so everyone at the table could find something they liked.  I had two whiskey drinks (the orange blossom and old fashioned) and both were delicious.  The menu catches your attention
column5: and we immediately found several options we wanted to try.  The staff was helpful
column7: and attentive to our pace for the evening.  The food came out in a timely fashion and looked great!
